description:
A country rat tries out the big city, a father learns a hard lesson, and it’s tortoise vs. hare.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Machi no Nezumi to Inaka no Nezumi / Oshira-sama / Usagi to Kame
The City Rat and the Country Rat / Oshira-sama / The Tortoise and the Hare
町のねずみと田舎のねずみ / おしらさま / うさぎとカメ
